DOC.brief_summary: Implementation adapt ParentCorps program Ugandan school improve school mental health service resource , teacher ' knowledge child mental health , teacher ' classroom behavioral management parent involvement skill .
DOC.brief_title: School-Based Mental Health Program Implementation Uganda
DOC.detailed_description: Participating school randomly assign 6-month long school-based intervention wait-list control group . The intervention focus improve teacher 's classroom behavioral management practice , parent engagement , child mental health knowledge . Teachers assess begin end study , 6 month intervention . Teachers ' parent engagement , mental health knowledge , behavioral practice classroom assess observation teacher rating .
DOC.criteria: Early childhood teacher Not early childhood teacher
